content: for sewing stuff legs x 2 - begin with white 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 8 3 4 single_crochet around 8 5 chain 1 fold piece in half and single_crochet across the top 4 - f/o leave long tail for sewing tail - begin with white 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 4 single_crochet around 12 5 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 9 - slip_stitch f/o leave long tail for sewing stuff copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 5/6 assembly more pictures are included on the next page cut off a length of brown yarn and remove one of the plies then use the remaining 12 plies to embroider a mouth onto the front of the body use black yarn to embroider eyes onto the front of the body sew the cheeks on either side of the eyes sew the ears onto the top of the body sew the arms on either side of the body sew the legs onto the bottom of the body use a slicker brush to brush the tail until fuzzy sew the tail onto the back of the body copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 6/6 copyright © 2023 icrochetthings
